issue.title: [C++] NULLPTR is not included in type_fwd.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14017](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14017). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
type_fwd.h uses macro NULLPTR but "util/macros.h" is not included.
